Package com.syntax.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSyntaxCaret
    If setSyntaxFont(java.awt.Font) is called, it automatically call setCaretHeight(int), the only abstract method in this class.
    AbstractSyntaxCaret.NoHighlightPainter
    Representation of disable highlighting
    AbstractSyntaxHeader
    Implementing AbstractSyntaxHeader to customizer head view of SyntaxEditPane
    DefaultSyntaxCaret
    DefaultSyntaxCaret supports automatically changing the height of caret when font is changed
    DefaultSyntaxHeader
    DefaultSyntaxHeader support showing line numbers and automatically change lines according to content
    SyntaxEditPane
    Support editting text with shortcut keys and scrollbars.
    SyntaxHorizontalScrollbarUI
    Derived class that draw horizontal scroll bar UI with specified color.
    SyntaxTextArea
    This is an text area which supports syntax coloring, highlighting, cursor painting and some other attribute setting
    SyntaxVerticalScrollbarUI
    Derived class that draw horizontal scroll bar UI with specified color.
